|cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 MiB |fla1_brand=Eon |fla1_model=EN29LV320AB-70TCP |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 MiB |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY5DU561622ETP-D43 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, internal,, 5-pad header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200,8,N,1) |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4321;BCM4321LKFBG, UN0810 P21, 861512 N3; |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM2055;BCM2055KFBG, HE0823 P20, 875740 N3; |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=none |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5397 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2528L;SiGe, 2528L, 8201Y;2; |flags= |stock_boot=CFE; |stock_os=Linux; |tp_firmware=DD-WRT, TomatoUSB, Tomato (shibby) |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=linksys |default_ssid_regex=^linksys$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui=00:1E:E5,00:21:29,00:22:6B,00:23:69 |oui_eth=00:1E:E5,00:21:29,00:22:6B,00:23:69 |default_ch= }} {{TagLine|Wireless-N Gigabit Router}}
{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=WRT310N}} WRT310N v1 serial numbers begin with '''CSF0'''. "3763-17140302R REV:XB" is silkscreened on the board shown below. The default SSID is '''linksys'''. ==Additional external links== ===Wikis=== *{{TechInfoDepot|Linksys_WRT310N_v1}} *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Linksys_WRT310N_v1.0 On the '''DD-WRT''' Wiki] ===Forums=== ====DD-WRT Forum threads==== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=26355 ''ddwrt WRT310N Support''] (high res pictures on page 3) *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=42949 ''jtag wrt310n''] (additional pictures) *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=642220 ''WRT310N v1 Client / Repeater toubles''] (OUI 00:22:6B) ====OpenWrt Forum threads==== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=18188 ''Linksys WRT310N?''] ==Images== File:Linksys WRT310N v1 angled.jpg|angled File:Linksys WRT310N v1 top.jpg|top File:Linksys WRT310N v1 bottom.jpg|bottom File:Linksys WRT310N v1 back.jpg|back File:Linksys WRT310N v1 label.jpg|label File:Linksys WRT310N v1 power supply.jpg|power supply [[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::label| ]][[Has images::power adapter| ]] File:Linksys WRT310N v1 board top.jpg|board top File:Linksys WRT310N v1 CPU.jpg|CPU File:Linksys WRT310N v1 RAM.jpg|RAM File:Linksys WRT310N v1 BCM4321.jpg|BCM4321 File:Linksys WRT310N v1 board ID.jpg|CyberTAN board ID File:Linksys WRT310N v1 board bot.jpg|board bottom File:Linksys WRT310N v1 Flash.jpg|Flash [[Has images::internal| ]]
